item.description:
Sat May 31 -Support Local Music at the CTLIVEMusic.com Spotlight

This is a FREE Event

Join CTLIVEMusic.com Saturday, May 31 8 pm at the Tribeca Caf√©, 1001 Hebron Ave in Glastonbury for the LIVE Local Music Spotlight featuring Local Music Spotlight winners, Signs of Life, Mark Garthwait, 45 RPM, and saxophonist Sante Isopo.

We invite all music lovers to support local music and experience this unforgettable music event.

CTLIVEMusic.com promotes and support local musicians with events and the Local Music
Spotlight, and also provides Promotions and Booking services.
To listen to Signs of Life and Mark Garthwait, visit http://www.CTLIVEMusi...

Visitors to http://www.CTLIVEMusi... can hear local musicians, and vote for their favorite music. The musician who receives the most votes is featured on the CTLIVEMusic home page.
All Connecticut Musicians are invited to enter the CTLIVEMusic.com Local Music Spotlight. Email a short bio, a picture, and an MP3 to: LocalMusic@CTLIVEMusic.com

*** MUSICIANS: We will have Promotions and Booking Agents available at the Local Music Spotlight, so bring your music in MP3 format, a picture and short bio on CD, or email them to LocalMusic@CTLIVEMusic.com ***

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Sat May 31 -Support Local Music at the CTLIVEMusic.com Spotlight
